content: We're also targeting major international conferences with original new data readouts with seven presentations scheduled within the next few months, including a presentation of the value, a proposition of antithrombotic removal in Germany at the European Society of Cardiology in August, new data with early initiation of CytoSorb together with ECMO that will be presented at the ELSO meeting in September and two very exciting new data releases at the European Association for Cardio-Thoracic Surgery later in October, including in randomized clinical trial in heart transplantation and the main results from the CTC registry data on acute liver failure and more data in septic shock.
